channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 21:22 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 21:22 Alarm lifted in Chernihiv region. Follow further messages. #Chernihiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 9:21 p.m. Alarm response in Poltava region. Stay tuned for further messages.
